# Bullets, Sling
## Overview
Bullets are shaped metal balls, designed to be used by a sling or halfling sling staff. Bullets come in a leather pouch that holds 10 bullets.


-tx-
| **Simple Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Ranged Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** |  |
| | Bullets, Sling (10) | 1 sp | — | — | — | — | 5 lbs. | — |  |

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 145
